DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the effectiveness of atorvastatin in lowering cholesterol and getting these high risk patients to their goals of LDL <115 mg/dl across starting doses of 10 mg, 20 mg, or 40 mg with one step titration.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Efficacy Of Atorvastatin For Lowering Cholesterol In High-Risk Patients With High Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: Dyslipidemia At a high risk for coronary heart disease Use of higher than usual maintenance doses of statin drugs at screening Uncontrolled diabetes or high blood pressure Impaired liver function
